content.html: Let’s be clear that this is an absolutely unhealthy and toxic way of working as there’s no real reason to do so. This is not a startup running out of money, about to go bankrupt if not for this manic sprint. It’s the worlds richest person doing this because he can. So he does.
content.value:
Let’s be clear that this is an absolutely unhealthy and toxic way of working as there’s no real reason to do so.

This is not a startup running out of money, about to go bankrupt if not for this manic sprint.

It’s the worlds richest person doing this because he can. So he does.
